word_mean: 姜黄：姜科植物姜黄的根茎，产于印度、中国和东印度群岛，所含姜黄为橘黄色成分，又因几种芳香成分而具辛辣味，用作着色剂、化学指示剂和调味品(如咖喱粉)

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English (earlier as tarmaret): perhaps from French terre mérite and modern Latin terra merita, literally 'deserving earth', perhaps an alteration of an oriental word

entry.tran: 姜黄根粉（用作烹饪调料）
entry.def: Turmeric is a yellow spice that is used to flavour food such as curry.

means.word_mean: 1. widely cultivated tropical plant of India having yellow flowers and a large aromatic deep yellow rhizome; source of a condiment and a yellow dye
2. ground dried rhizome of the turmeric plant used as seasoning
